title: Purchasing of Aerial Bundled Conductor of 3000km for the Ceylon Electricity Board
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Ravi Karunanayake, the Minister of Power, Energy and Business Development to award the contract for the supply and delivery of 3000km  of Aerial Bundled Conductor for the distribution regions of the Ceylon Electricity Board to M/s ACL Cables PLC for a sum of Rs.1780.6 million as recommended by the Standing Cabinet appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
